summary: Mark A Speiser is identified as an employee of the U.S. House of Representatives Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). The consistent appearance of his name across these reports indicates his continuous employment with the HSCA during this period.
significance: Mark A Speiser's significance lies in his employment with the HSCA, the committee tasked with investigating the JFK assassination.
